Class Ship

java.lang.Object
iscteiul.ista.battleship.Ship
All Implemented Interfaces:
IShip
Direct Known Subclasses:
Barge, Caravel, Carrack, Frigate, Galleon
public abstract class Ship extends Object implements IShip
Abstract base class for all ship types used in the Battleship game.

Concrete ship implementations (e.g. Galleon, Frigate, Carrack, Caravel, Barge) extend this class. It stores common state such as category, bearing and the list of occupied positions and provides shared utilities used by fleet and game logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship(String category, Compass bearing, IPosition pos)
      Create a new Ship with the provided category, bearing and reference position. Subclasses typically fill the positions list in their constructors.
      Parameters:
      category - ship category/name
      bearing - orientation (must not be null)
      pos - reference position (must not be null)
